column4: I'm trying to play Wolfenstein Enemy Territory but I have no sound. When I run it from a terminal I get the following error:
After some googeling I tried to instal oss-compat but that gives errors too:
I can play music, movies and other games fine, only Wolfenstein doesn't work. Can anyone help me with this?
sudo apt-get install alsa-oss then run the game like... aoss ./game
like if I wanted to play... newwolf... aoss /path/to/newwolf
alsa-oss is already the newest version., still no sound..
how do you usally launch the wolf client?
I just type et in the console
I wonder if iowolfet is out yet...
keep an eye on http://ioquake3.org/2010/08/12/welcome-wolfenstein-enemy-territory-and-return-to-castle-wolfenstein/ since they are re-writing it with SDL sound
I hadn't heard of that yet, sounds like a good idea. Thanks for pointing it out.
